name: Sirenmon
description: Sirenmon resembles a pale blue, feathered humanoid creature inspired by the sirens from Greek Mythology. It has fish fin-like wings, and a fish-like tail. It wears a red bow tie, a white pancho and a red cap with a golden musical note attached to it. It has black talons, white glove-like claws, turquoise-green hair, and a golden, beak-like helmet covering its face.
